
# North Payments

## General 
 
**Code:** `northpayments` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] North Payments 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  We can help grow your business Start-up Businesses Here at North Payments we have unrivalled capability to help start-ups access and benefit from the opportunities of eCommerce. We keep the process simple, and can have you up and running within just a few days. Growing Businesses For those businesses that have progressed from start-up stage, North Payments offers a number of benefits which will help you by providing integrated payments and transaction management services.
